about_the_game:
Unleash your creativity

Build dream houses from the ground up. Fine-tune every detail with practical tools to create walls, roofs, and stairs. Explore an extensive furniture catalog to decorate and personalize your creations. Whether you imagine a cozy cottage or a grand mansion, the choice is yours.

Make the residents happy

Bring your homes to life with delightful residents! Design a house that will make them smile by taking their requests into account. Watch as they interact, form friendships, and live their day-to-day lives. Help them with renovations or their daily troubles to get to know them better.

Become the mayor

Be an exemplary mayor! Build your own city to attract new characters. Plan roads and construct buildings to make your city more appealing and keep your residents happy. Discover new shops and activities as your city expands. Join the city’s festivities and decorate for the occasion. Every day brings something new to do in your city.

Share your work

Preserve your creations by saving your builds and capturing stunning photos. Publish your buildings online or download others to integrate into your city. Share your masterpieces with creators around the world and inspire each other.

Join our community and start building your dream world today!

name: Neighborhood

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Modern Intel Core i5 or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • VR Support: Oculus Rift (Experimental)

short_description: Dive into a world of creativity and freedom where you can build, customize, and decorate the home of your dreams. Build houses for people, watch them settle in your neighborhood.
